request_templates.name: Alaska Standard Records Request
request_templates.description: General purpose records request for Alaska state agencies
request_templates.template_text:
Dear Records Custodian:

Pursuant to the Alaska Public Records Act, Alaska Statutes 40.25.110 through 40.25.125, I respectfully request access to and copies of the following public records:

[SPECIFY RECORDS REQUESTED]

Please describe the records sought in sufficient detail to enable the agency to locate the records. I request both examination of the records and copies.

Per 2 AAC 96.325, please respond to this request within 10 working days. If you cannot respond completely within 10 working days, you may extend the response time by up to 10 additional working days by sending written notice explaining the reason for the extension.

I understand that there is no charge for the first two person-hours of search time per calendar month. If additional time is required, please notify me of the estimated costs before proceeding.

If you determine that some portions of these records are exempt from disclosure under AS 40.25.120, please segregate the confidential information and make available any parts that are not confidential. Please cite the specific statutory authority for any withholdings.

If you deny any portion of this request, please advise me of my right to administrative appeal and the procedures for filing such an appeal.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[REQUESTER NAME]
[ADDRESS]
[CITY, STATE ZIP]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]
[DATE]

request_templates.name: Alaska Electronic Records Request
request_templates.description: Specific template for requesting electronic records and services under AS 40.25.115
request_templates.template_text:
Dear Records Custodian:

Pursuant to Alaska Statutes 40.25.115 and the Alaska Public Records Act, I respectfully request the following public records in electronic format:

[SPECIFY ELECTRONIC RECORDS REQUESTED]

I request that the agency provide these records in [SPECIFY FORMAT - e.g., Excel, CSV, PDF] format if possible. If the records cannot be provided in the requested format, please provide them in the electronic format in which they are maintained.

Per AS 40.25.115, I understand that:
1. Records must exist in electronic format
2. The agency must be able to retrieve them with reasonable effort
3. Providing records electronically must not violate licensing agreements or intellectual property rights

Please complete this response as promptly as possible upon receiving any required payment as specified in AS 40.25.115(e). If you anticipate charging fees, please notify me of the estimated actual costs before proceeding.

If electronic format is not available and records exist only in paper format, please process this request under AS 40.25.110 with the standard 10 working day response timeline.

If you determine that some portions of these records are exempt from disclosure, please provide the non-exempt portions and cite specific statutory authority for any withholdings.

Thank you for your assistance with this electronic records request.

Sincerely,
[REQUESTER NAME]
[ADDRESS]
[CITY, STATE ZIP]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]
[DATE]

request_templates.name: Alaska Administrative Appeal
request_templates.description: Template for filing administrative appeal of denied records request
request_templates.template_text:
Dear [AGENCY APPEAL AUTHORITY]:

I hereby file this administrative appeal of the denial of my public records request submitted to your agency on [REQUEST DATE] and denied on [DENIAL DATE].

My original request sought the following records:
[DESCRIBE ORIGINAL REQUEST]

Your agency denied this request based on [CITE AGENCY'S STATED REASONS]. I believe this denial is incorrect for the following reasons:

1. [EXPLAIN WHY EXEMPTION DOESN'T APPLY]
2. [CITE RELEVANT APRA PROVISIONS]
3. [REFERENCE ALASKA PRESUMPTION IN FAVOR OF DISCLOSURE]

The Alaska Public Records Act creates a presumption in favor of disclosure, and exemptions must be narrowly construed. Per AS 40.25.122, any determination of confidentiality must balance the need for confidentiality against the public interest in disclosure.

I request that you:
1. Reverse the denial decision
2. Provide the requested records
3. If partial withholding is maintained, segregate confidential portions and release non-exempt information

I understand that if this administrative appeal is unsuccessful, I may file an appeal in superior court within 30 days of your final administrative order per AS 40.25.124.

Please provide your agency's specific procedures and timeline for processing this administrative appeal.

Thank you for your reconsideration of this matter.

Sincerely,
[REQUESTER NAME]
[ADDRESS]
[CITY, STATE ZIP]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]
[DATE]

Enclosures: Copy of original request and denial letter
